attributes.action: make all imigrants obtain medical insurance either before or on entering the uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The NHS is already over stretched to the limit as it is, as residents in the uk we have to obtain insurance when going abroad.imigrants should be made to pay a small contribution every week for the first two years until they have contributed enough national insurance into the system.

rejection.details: there are lots of petitions already with similar themes
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
